transcripts.text: This is the Fair Immigration 2020 virtual town hall.  We're speaking with voters across America about jobs, immigration, and the impact of the current global crisis on their lives.  Next up, we have Peter.  Peter, he's joining us from Miami.  Go ahead, please.

All these politicians talk all the time, but I want to know what concrete steps we should take to reform the nation's asylum law.  We have almost a million case backlog.  Crazy.  So what do we do about it?
